title: Snapdragon 820-powered Lenovo Z2 Plus now available for just Rs 11,999 on Amazon
text:
Snapdragon 820-powered Lenovo Z2 Plus now available for just Rs 11,999 on... Snapdragon 820-powered Lenovo Z2 Plus now available for just Rs 11,999 on Amazon By - March 29, 2017 “The Z2 Plus is now the most affordable smartphone in India with a Snapdragon 820 SoC” 
The Qualcomm Snapdragon 820-powered Lenovo Z2 Plus flagship is now available at a dirt-cheap price on Amazon India. The e-tailer is offering the 32GB variant of the phone for just Rs 11,999, down from the launch price of Rs 17,999. The 64GB model is now available for Rs 14,999, down from the launch price of Rs 19,999. The phone will be in stock at the reduced pricing starting tomorrow. However, as of now, it’s not clear if this is a permanent price drop. 
To recap on the specs, the Lenovo Z2 Plus ( review / FAQs ) features a 5-inch full HD LTPS 2.5D curved display, a fingerprint sensor, a 13MP rear camera, an 8MP front shooter, 4G, VoLTE, Android Marshmallow and a 3,500mAh battery with fast charging support. The phone comes in two variants – 3GB RAM / 32GB storage and 4GB RAM / 64GB storage. Facebook Comments
